titleInfo.title: George Morgan's Grand Ole Opry Show at the Senior High School Auditorium

mods.abstract: Three color window card (blue and red on yellow) announcing George Morgan's Grand Ole Opry Show with Annie Lou and Danny, Cowboy Copas, Mother Maybelle Carter, Ken Marvin, Red Murphy, Gene Martin and the Candy Kids Band at the Senior High School Auditorium on September 21.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
